name: Jamaican Jerk Chicken
preparation: Rub chicken breasts with Jamaican Jerk seasoning, dark rum, lime juice and vegetable oil. Marinate in refrigerator for up to 4 hours.
Lightly spray a frying pan with vegetable oil.
Quickly sear rubbed chicken breasts over medium-high heat. When both sides are browned, place pan in oven for approximately 15–20 minutes.
tips: Cook Once, Eat Twice: Make extra Jerk Chicken and serve with rice and steamed vegetables on another night, or top a Caesar Salad.
